text: Approval for a change to the lcd panel model, power supply unit, and addition of an internal fan.  The device is indicated for use as an adjunct to fetal heart rate monitoring to determine whether obstetrical intervention is warranted when there is increased risk of developing metabolic acidosis.  The device is intended for use in patients with: 1) planned vaginal delivery; 2) >36 completed weeks gestation; 3) singleton fetus; 4) vertex presentation; and 5) ruptured amniotic membranes.
